title: Role of GM foods in the Global Food Supply

content.question: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on what the role of GM foods should be in the global food supply.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on what the role of GM foods should be in the global food supply.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
